frontmatter.title: Get top 5 rated movies in each genre
frontmatter.mysql:
select genre, movie_name, rating
(SELECT 
  genre,
  movie_name,
  rating,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY genre ORDER BY rating DESC) as movie_rank
FROM movies
) 
where movie_rank <= 5
ORDER BY genre, rating DESC;
frontmatter.postgres:
select genre, movie_name, rating
(SELECT 
  genre,
  movie_name,
  rating,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY genre ORDER BY rating DESC) as movie_rank
FROM movies
) 
where movie_rank <= 5
ORDER BY genre, rating DESC;
